#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define i64 long long
#define F first
#define S second
#define fast_io std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);cout.tie(0)
using namespace std;
int main(){
   int n,t,i;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--) {
      cin>>n;
      if(n==1) cout<<"A";
      else if(n==2) cout<<"AA";
      else{
          cout<<"AA";
          i64 a=1;
          i64 b=1;
          i64 s;
          for(i=3;i<=n;++i){
              s=(a+b)%26;
              a=b%26;
              b=s%26;
              int num=s%26;
              if(num==0) num+=26;
              cout<<(char)(num+'A'-1);
          }
        }
        cout<<"\n";
   }
   return 0;
}
